name: Honesty Is The Best Policy (Skill Card)
text:
Honest / Skill
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Once per Battle Phase, during the Damage Step, if a monster with 2000 or less ATK you control battles: You can pay 1000 LP; that monster gains ATK equal to the ATK of the opponent's monster it is battling during damage calculation. You can only use this Skill once per turn, and only thrice per Duel.
You cannot activate the effects of "Honest", "Dark Honest", or "Elemental HERO Honest Neos" on the same turn you activate this card.
